text: Mwakolanjileje (wanache wakuleledwao) ni (mena) gaachatati wao, yalakweyo ni yaili yakulungamika nnope kwa Allah. Sano naga ngankwamanyilila achatati wao, basi (mwakolanjeje kuti) achalongo achinâ€™jenu pa dini ni akupedwa ulokosyo wenu. Sano chipawe pangali ulemwa kukwenu pa yannemwisye, nambo (chipawe pana ulemwa) pa yajitesile melepe mitima jenu. Soni Allah awele Jwakululuka kusyene, Jwachanasa channope
